title: Alternative LOLReplay (.lpf file) Player
body:
Hi guys,

It seems like my LoLReplay seems to save the games fine - it's just that once they're saved, I'm unable to play them with LoLReplay.

I tried BaronReplay as well (new one), but the "Failed Reason is Reason" error message always pops up after each normal game (custom games do record fine for some reason).

Do you know any software that can also play these .lpr (LoLReplay) files? So I can record with LoLReplay, play with the alternative software?

Alternatively, if you could tell me the fix to BaronReplay or LoLReplay that would solve my issues too :)


Thanks!

replies.body:
Are you trying to record gameplay or analyse the game?

If your recording gameplay just get Open Broadcast Software (OBS) and record your perspective.
else
try fixing a replay system if u are looking for overall game analysis.


If you are doing the former, here is a link to some instructions for setting up OBS.
[Ayy Lmao. Small guide by yours truely](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/R0QgN2o5-id-like-to-start-recording-by-league-games-so-i-can-re-watch-how-bad-i-am-whats-a-good-program?comment=0005)

Analyse the game.

Thanks for the OBS suggestion but removing the fog of war on the replay etc would be really useful!
